alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 2:32PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Roseau, northern Beltrami and Lake of the Woods Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Oaks Corner, or 38 miles southeast of Roseau, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baudette, Williams, Roosevelt, Birch Beach, Wannaska, Norris Camp and Clementson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
